name: Elevator
storyline: Elevator is a story driven exploration game, set in a big office building. You play as Benjamin who is applying for a new job at a software company. Your journey to the top of the building, where the job interview is held, is interrupted when the elevator takes you to the bottom floor. Through the game you find out that the elevator, and the entire building is controlled by an advanced AI called Ava. On your way to your job interview you meet Thomas, an erratic IT worker who seems to be the only person there. Find your way through locked doors, confusing rooms and an uncooperative elevator and get to your interview.
summary: Inspired by games like The Stanley Parable and Portal 2 you have to find your way through a creepy building, locked doors, an uncooperative elevator and challenging puzzles to get to your job interview on the top floor in this uncanny adventure game!
